name: 9GAG - Annoyance Fixes
description: Just some fixes for 9GAG. If I can't do those fixes anymore, I'll finally leave 9GAG once and forever. Dunno what devs are doing, but it's really annoying.
additional_info:
Ever wanted to write a text, but you hate to scroll up each and every line? Like just to look, what you've written? I don't know why 9GAG didn't implement it by themselves, because the solution is really easy. In Theory, they just need to include a simple CSS3-selector: resize. My fix needed a bit more code (forgive me for saying code, but it's the most fitting word), because of their bad implementation of their style-script.
So my fix sets the min-height of the text-area to 150px and is dynamically resizable.

• Update Nov. 11th, 2017: Added a fix for the annoyance of the new sidebar / menu. Bring back the old behavior, we used to use.
• Update Dec.  5th: Hide entire Youtube posts. Nobody needs Youtube videos on 9GAG.
